#summary Relevant links.

=Chess Engine Programming=
  * [http://www.gamedev.net/reference/programming/features/chess1/ Chess Programming] - Overviews of various concepts by François-Dominic Laramée, the author of Java Chess.
  * [http://www.frayn.net/beowulf/theory.html Computer Chess Programming Theory] - Overviews of various concepts by Colin Frayn, the author of Beowulf.
  * [http://www.cis.uab.edu/hyatt/pubs.html Online Technical Papers] - In-depth discussions of bitboards, hashing, and parallel search by Bob Hyatt, the author of Crafty.
  * [http://www.tim-mann.org/xboard/engine-intf.html Chess Engine Communication Protocol] - By Tim Mann, the author of XBoard.

  * [http://www.ascotti.org/programming/chess/Shannon%20-%20Programming%20a%20computer%20for%20playing%20chess.pdf Programming a Computer for Playing Chess] - By Claude E. Shannon, the father of Information Theory.

=Fun=
  * [http://www.scottmccloud.com/comics/chess/chess.html My Obsession with Chess] - A comic by Scott !McCloud.
